title: Design for Sand-Blasted Glass Mural: Mercury Gathering Air Waves Amidst Planets and Stars
medium: Brush and white gouache, black wash, graphite on tan paper
description: Mercury flying diagonally from upper right to lower left, with his arms extended, gathers air waves portrayed as three series of parallel lines gathered to a point.
name: Drawing
